title: Fun Detour
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Hey, You-chan, Ruby-chan, come here! Look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waah, so cute~! It’s enamel pins!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>There are lots of different ones~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yours would be this one, right, Chika-chan? A Mikan! Ruby-chan’s would be.... maybe this one? A ribbon! Ah, this one is also good.... Look, you usually wouldn’t expect to find a sewing machine pin, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You’re right! What would You-chan’s be.... A sailboat? A floater?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm~, You-chan’s would probably be this one. Sailor outfit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No, wait. Your impression of me is a sailor uniform?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Fufufu, Ruby thinks it fits you perfectly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Not you too, Ruby-chan! But well, I guess the sailor outfit one is cute, so I do kind of want it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hey hey, why don’t we buy these enamel pins for everyone else too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah, let’s do that! Ruby will pick the one for Onee-chan, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
